name: In The Middle
description:
Intro  🚘 💭

In ‘In the Middle’ you experience a devastating car accident involving the lives of four closely connected friends. You, the player, are caught in a loop of the accident, in which you must try and figure out how to stop this all from happening.

You, the player, will experience flashbacks that will tell past stories of the four closely connected friends and will help build an emotional attachment to these characters.

Within each loop of the car, the player will be tasked with figuring out ways with which they could save themselves and their friends from a horrible fate. Can you save your friends? 

Mission Statement  🎯

The purpose of our game is to create an experience that emotionally attaches the player to the characters that we create and the decisions they will have to make. 

We want to create a narrative first-person puzzle game that involves a strong story and relationships that the player can relate to.   How To Play ⌨️ 🖱️ W/A/S/D - Player Movement Mouse - Player Camera Rotation F - Interact  Q - To Zoom A / D - To choose Dialogue Options W / S / Up Arrow / Down Arrow - To Breathe In & Out  How To Install 🖥️ 1) Download file 2) Unzip or Extract 3) Click on the Map Icon application within the folder to launch game  ( Do not worry about the "Unknown File " Prompt ) 4) Enjoy
